trans-unit.source: Log on to the [Azure Portal](https://portal.azure.com), and then click **+NEW** at the bottom of the screen.
trans-unit.target: Log on to the [Azure Portal](https://portal.azure.com), and then click **+NEW** at the bottom of the screen.

trans-unit.source: Click on **New**, then **Web + Mobile**, then **Notification Hub**, then **Quick Create**.
trans-unit.target: Click on **New**, then **Web + Mobile**, then **Notification Hub**, then **Quick Create**.

trans-unit.source: Make sure you specify a unique name in the **Notification Hub** field.
trans-unit.target: Make sure you specify a unique name in the **Notification Hub** field.

trans-unit.source: Select your desired **Region**, **Subscription** and **Resource Group** (if you have one already).
trans-unit.target: Select your desired **Region**, **Subscription** and **Resource Group** (if you have one already).

trans-unit.source: If you already have a service bus namespace that you want to create the hub in, select it through the **Select Existing** option in the **Namespace** field.
trans-unit.target: If you already have a service bus namespace that you want to create the hub in, select it through the **Select Existing** option in the **Namespace** field.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, you can use the default name which will be created based on the hub name as long as the namespace name is available.
trans-unit.target: Otherwise, you can use the default name which will be created based on the hub name as long as the namespace name is available.

trans-unit.source: Azure Portal - Set notification hub properties
trans-unit.target: Azure Portal - Set notification hub properties

trans-unit.source: Once the namespace and notification hub are created, you will be taken to the respective portal page.
trans-unit.target: Once the namespace and notification hub are created, you will be taken to the respective portal page.

trans-unit.source: Azure Portal - Notification hub portal page
trans-unit.target: Azure Portal - Notification hub portal page

trans-unit.source: Click on **Settings** and then **Access Policies** - take note of the two connection strings that are made available to you, as you will need them to handle push notifications later.
trans-unit.target: Click on **Settings** and then **Access Policies** - take note of the two connection strings that are made available to you, as you will need them to handle push notifications later.

trans-unit.source: Azure Portal - Notification hub connection strings
trans-unit.target: Azure Portal - Notification hub connection strings
